alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Nance; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 9:53PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Limited Frost Development Possible Friday Morning... Although more favorable conditions for frost development on Friday morning will focus north of this area, there is at least an outside chance for limited frost development particularly within northern portions of Valley, Greeley and Nance counties near and up to a few hours past sunrise. Confidence in widespread frost development is not high enough at this time to justify a formal Frost Advisory for Friday morning, but should skies clear faster than currently anticipated, then it is possible that frost could become more of an issue. Whether or not any frost develops Friday morning, conditions appear much more favorable for frost formation and perhaps even slightly sub-freezing temperatures Friday night into Saturday morning.
